section.name: ToolWindowManager
section.p:
This interface is the main entry point to manager MyDoggy. Using this interface the user can register/unregister tool windows, groups. The user can get the content manager instance and type descriptor templates.
To obtain an instance of ToolWindowManager interface see mydoggy-plaf

subsection.name: ToolWindowManagerDescriptor
subsection.p:
This interface is used to modify the behaviours of the ToolWindowManager.
You can now change the push-away mode of tool windows. See Using page for how to.
